tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Had visited this doctor on a friend's recommendation for a second opinion on root canal. His diagnosis was quick and excellent. Unlike other doctors he didn't ask to go for additional tests, nor insisted on expensive treatments. Instead of a root canal he suggested cleaning the original filling and refilling the tooth. Asked to go for root canal only if the problem persist.
The doctor, clinic, staff all were excellent.
reply_text:
Thank you for the kind words.
Always been our endeavour to provide quality and ethically correct dental treatment options n services to all our patients.
Look after your teeth well n keep smiling.

Thanks you for your feedback.
During these covid times we have to follow certain protocols as published by our dental council.
We only allow Relatives of handicapped patients and minors into our waiting area following norms set up by state and national medical councils.

We have associate doctor in our practice who is a qualified dentist with more than 5 yrs experience and equally adept at treating any dental problem.

Just shows your level of understanding and respect for the dental profession .

review: I found the place a little expensive. The treatment was only dental cleaning but he charged a bomb on it.
reply_text:
Thankyou for your valuable feedback.
Oral prophylaxis or cleaning is a very important part of maintenance of oral health. At our centre we treat it just like any other important dental procedure. It varies from patient to patient depending on health of the oral tissues and maintenance by the person. So the procedure Is customised accordingly taking care of the pt needs and maintenance of proper hygiene and sterization protocols using state of the art equipment.
Remuneration is also in accordance with the treatment imparted.
